item.title: Very uneven paving close to the trees (two trees) outside 10-14 Chepstow Place, 28th August
item.description:
My 90 year old mother tripped over these protruding paving stones adjacent to the trees close to 10-14 Chepstow Place W2. They need to be addressed before more serious injury occurs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Chepstow Place, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On 6th July the basement of our home flooded, 28th August
item.description:
We were not aware of the possibility of reporting it to you, to ensure that the nearby drains on the road are cleared. But we've now seen that Westbourne Park Road drains were due to have been cleared in July. Looking at the drain today with the drainage company which came to clear our own drains (in case they were the issue) it seems that the drains on the street locally may benefit from being cleared to minimize the risk of flooding from reoccurring. Please let me know when you can check the drains and your findings.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Westbourne Park Road, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet
